scripts.build-handler: docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t jenkins-lambda/handler functions/handler/. && docker tag jenkins-lambda/handler 671123374425.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins-lambda/handler && docker image prune --force
scripts.push-handler: aws ecr get-login-password --region eu-central-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin 671123374425.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com && docker push 671123374425.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/jenkins-lambda/handler
